user.title: OPNsence
user.description:
Set required parameters to connect to your router.
`API Key` and `API Secret` values are acquired from your router using the web interface. For more information on this procedure, refer to the OPNsense [documentation](https://docs.opnsense.org/development/how-tos/api.html#creating-keys).

User with API Key requires privileges for:
* GUI Name: Diagnostics: ARP Table
* GUI Name: Diagnostics: Network Insight

You can use multiple interfaces for tracking devices, separated by commas.

data.tracker_interfaces: Interface(s) to use for tracking devices
